name: VTofu Settings
summary: Learn about .VTOFU files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In VTofu, users move their mouse and click to move a virtual tofu block. From VTofu's menu, users can apply a color or image to VTofu's tofu block and/or background. Users can then click the Save button to save these settings in a VTOFU file. This allows them to load their tofu and background settings back into VTofu at a later time.

instructions: You can open a VTOFU file with VTofu (Web). To do so:
In your web browser, navigate to the VTofu website.
Select and open your VTOFU file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
